ValidationRule.description: Require Case linking on Mitel Call Related to Field
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ( BEGINS( Subject, 'Call Inbound') || BEGINS( Subject, 'Call Outbound') ) && ( CONTAINS(Owner:User.UserRole.Name, 'Saver') || CONTAINS(Owner:User.UserRole.Name, 'Service') ) && NOT(BEGINS( WhatId , "005"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Link this call to a Case in the "Related To" field
